meanings.definition: Confined or restricted by a straightjacket.
meanings.sent1: The patient felt straightjacketed in the tight garment.
meanings.sent2: The actor's movements were straightjacketed by the restrictive costume.
meanings.sent3: Trying to dance in a straightjacketed outfit would be quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity felt straightjacketed by the strict rules of the project.
meanings.sent5: The straightjacketed feeling of being stuck in traffic on a hot day was unbearable.

meanings.definition: Restrained or limited in movement or action by a straightjacket.
meanings.sent1: The criminal was straightjacketed to prevent escape.
meanings.sent2: The patient was straightjacketed for safety during the procedure.
meanings.sent3: Imagine trying to eat a meal while straightjacketed!
meanings.sent4: His creativity was straightjacketed by the demands of his job.
meanings.sent5: The straightjacketed feeling of being overwhelmed by responsibilities was suffocating.
